abstract: If you seriously hate tangled earphone cables, a pricey little retaining strap called the Sinch may be your ticket to cable cleanliness.
snippet: If you seriously hate tangled earphone cables, a pricey little retaining strap called the Sinch may be your ticket to cable cleanliness.
lead_paragraph: If you seriously hate tangled earphone cables, a pricey little retaining strap may be your ticket to cable cleanliness.

headline.main: A Pricey Cable Corral for Neatniks
